author: asankha
msg: cut branch for the release of Synapse 1.0

author: asankha
msg: performance improvements. One change is minor and side-effect free. The other disables caching when serializing an outgoing request at Axiom level

author: esm
msg: [PLUTO-375], [PLUTO-376]: Pluto 1.1.x now works Tomcat 6.0.x (tested with Tomcat 6.0.13).  The pluto maven plugin was updated to support installation into Tomcat 6, and the JSP 2.1 Expression Evaluator was implemented thanks to a patch from Benjamin Gould.

author: esm
msg: [PLUTO-375], [PLUTO-376]: Pluto 1.2.x now works Tomcat 6.0.x (tested with Tomcat 6.0.13).  The pluto maven plugin was updated to support installation into Tomcat 6, and the JSP 2.1 Expression Evaluator was implemented thanks to a patch from Benjamin Gould.

author: ryan
msg: static utility classes in SystemInfoHandler don't need to be private
